page.title: 07Opera Singer
page.content: { {Angela Feeney}went to St. Kevin's Primary School and later to St. Rose's Secondary School where she was a leading{singer}in the school choir. Her parents encouraged Angela in her early love of folk music. As she grew older she studied at the{School of {Music in Belfast}and later with Veronica Dunne in Dublin. She was a well known folk singer throughout Ireland inspite of travelling difficulties due to the troubles. She was offered a chance to study{opera}at {Richard Strauss Conservatorium}in Munich. Her friends came together to organise concerts and raise money Angela needed. She became an opera singer and can sing in different languages. She has returned to Belfast to appear in{"Madama {Butterfly"}which was a great success.
